title: Error when importing mlfinlab
body:
**Describe the bug**
I am using WSL Ubuntu 20. I install mlfinlab with no errors and when importing it, I get errors

**To Reproduce**
conda create -n mlfinlab_env python=3.7
conda activate mlfinlab
pip install mlfinlab
python
import mlfinlab

**Traceback error**
RuntimeError: module compiled against API version 0xe but this version of numpy is 0xd
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlfinlab/__init__.py", line 22, in <module>
    import mlfinlab.portfolio_optimization as portfolio_optimization
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlfinlab/portfolio_optimization/__init__.py", line 5, in <module>
    from mlfinlab.portfolio_optimization.modern_portfolio_theory import CriticalLineAlgorithm
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlfinlab/portfolio_optimization/modern_portfolio_theory/__init__.py", line 5, in <module>
    from mlfinlab.portfolio_optimization.modern_portfolio_theory.mean_variance import MeanVarianceOptimisation
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlfinlab/portfolio_optimization/modern_portfolio_theory/mean_variance.py", line 9, in <module>
    import cvxpy as cp
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cvxpy/__init__.py", line 18, in <module>
    from cvxpy.atoms import *
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cvxpy/atoms/__init__.py", line 20, in <module>
    from cvxpy.atoms.geo_mean import geo_mean
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cvxpy/atoms/geo_mean.py", line 20, in <module>
    from cvxpy.utilities.power_tools import (fracify, decompose, approx_error, lower_bound,
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cvxpy/utilities/power_tools.py", line 18, in <module>
    from cvxpy.atoms.affine.reshape import reshape
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cvxpy/atoms/affine/reshape.py", line 18, in <module>
    from cvxpy.atoms.affine.hstack import hstack
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cvxpy/atoms/affine/hstack.py", line 18, in <module>
    from cvxpy.atoms.affine.affine_atom import AffAtom
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cvxpy/atoms/affine/affine_atom.py", line 22, in <module>
    from cvxpy.cvxcore.python import canonInterface
  File "/home/marcos/miniconda3/envs/mrh_trading/lib/python3.7/site-packages/cvxpy/cvxcore/python/__init__.py", line 3, in <module>
    import _cvxcore
ImportError: numpy.core.multiarray failed to import

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Windows 10 WSL Ubuntu 20
